Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Pablo Rivera "Pablo Rivera"
Reviews.Content: Works perfectly fine, very easy to use. My friend was able to put 2 SIM cards in it and use them, it even "asks" him which SIM he wants to use.

ProductInfo.Features:
Android 4.2.2 with 1.3GHz MTK6572W, Cortex A7 Dual-core processor and 512MB RAM + 4GB ROM
Support 2G network: GSM 850/900/1800/1900MHz; Support 3G network: WCDMA 850/2100MHz
4.0 inch large 2-point-touch  capacitive screen with 800 x 480 pixels screen resolution, 260K Colors
5.0M Pixels High definition back camera with flashlight, front 2.0M camera
Built-in GPS navigation with A-GPS assisted, makes the positioning swiftly and accurately
ProductInfo.Name: Unlocked Cubot GT90 4.0 Inch Screen Android 4.2.2 1.3GHz Cortex A7 Dual core Dual SIM Dual Standby 3G Cell phone Smart phone, Support GPS Wifi Bluetooth (Red)
